bio: When people can connect each other through the emotions of music, only love remains in this world. I'm camel on the journey to do it.
contributionDescription:
We want our community to be able to have an airdrop, or at least our voice can reach the hearts of the OP foundation, young and passionate leaders. I hope they understand the importance of music for the next cycle.
Artists of all kinds have long struggled to support themselves, and NFTs offer a potentially viable way for them to support themselves. The fact that money is involved does not make them securities.
We find it important to support new artists participating in Web3.
impactDescription:
We have helped attract thousands of collectors on sound xyz , a platform that uses OP as their main blockchain layer.
We have been leading for weeks with mints and curator volumes.
We have helped dozens of artists sell music on sound xyz with minted music on OP L2.
pwCategorySuggestions: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Smart Contract Platforms, Music Streaming
pwRecategorizeReason: NO. Although this application uses first-person references, indicating an individual, the applicant details a project (https://www.sound.xyz/camel) and outline collective achievements and goals which indicate a project application rather than an individual.
